Junior Software Developer.employer-name: FDM Grupa Polska sp. z o.o.About the company
Junior Software Developer.responsibilities-1: Your responsibilitiesThis specific role will be based within a leading global bank and will provide fantastic cutting-edge experience combining technology with the financial services sector. We are hiring multiple individuals to work in a team of Software Development Consultants with one of our clients based in central Kraków.In your role you will gain invaluable hands-on experience working on the latest technologies while helping our clients design and build software solutions. You will learn to create code that is modular, robust, scalable and maintainable to a professional standard. Your responsibilities will involve ensuring that programmes and applications are working effectively and meeting all technical and business requirements. A career in Software Development suits those who enjoy applying their technical and creative minds to finding solutions to real-world software problems.FDM will provide you with the necessary training to gain the skills needed for this role. We welcome applicants from all degree backgrounds. All you need is your drive and passion for building an exciting and dynamic career in the world’s fastest growing industry.
Junior Software Developer.requirements-1: Our requirementsBachelors degree (score 4 and above) – preferably within a technology discipline, but all degrees are welcomeEligibility to work in PolandPreferred English level B2 or higherPassion for technology - no previous experience in the field requiredExcellent communication skills and ability to build relationshipsMotivation, ambition and a drive to succeedStrong analytical and decision-making skillsInterest in working in Kraków to support our international clientsCommitment to an 18-months contract with FDM upon completion of the training period
Junior Software Developer.requirements-expected-1: Bachelors degree (score 4 and above) – preferably within a technology discipline, but all degrees are welcomeEligibility to work in PolandPreferred English level B2 or higherPassion for technology - no previous experience in the field requiredExcellent communication skills and ability to build relationshipsMotivation, ambition and a drive to succeedStrong analytical and decision-making skillsInterest in working in Kraków to support our international clientsCommitment to an 18-months contract with FDM upon completion of the training period
Junior Software Developer.offered-1: What we offer13 weeks of acclaimed and commercially relevant paid training in: Professional and Communication skills (employability skills, interview preparation and CV tailoring), SQL, Unix, OO Development using Java or .NET, Web Application Design, Java Data Access, Java EE and Java Spring,Opportunity to achieve industry-recognised qualificationsChance to secure a placement with world-renowned companies - after 18 months of commercial experience, you can decide to continue working for the client, progress to be a senior consultant at FDM or choose a different pathway using the connections and experience you have gainedOpportunities for career development in Poland as well as internationallyIndividual mentoring and ongoing support throughout your entire FDM journeyOpen door to tech talks, networking and social events
Junior Software Developer.about-us-1: About UsFDM is a FTSE 250 company, multi award-winning employer and market leader in the Recruit, Train and Deploy industry. We’re new to Poland, but with over 5,000+ employees, we provide IT services on a global scale and work with clients in 30+ industries across the UK, Europe, North America and APAC, launching the careers of over 2,000 graduates every year.With 90+ nationalities working together as a team, we encourage inclusivity and celebrate diversity, in terms of background, culture and skills. Our Women in Tech initiative supports women in the industry, aiming to create a more gender balanced workforce. As a part of the FDM consultant community, your efforts will always be recognised and rewarded, and you will be supported throughout your FDM journey to achieve your career goals.Whether you've been studying for a role in the technology industry or not, we have exciting opportunities available for you. Why not make an application today to secure your place for our upcoming training sessions?

Developer JIRA.about-us-extended-1: NCBR+ sp. z o.o.Wspólnie z Narodowym Centrum Badań i Rozwoju (w ramach Grupy NCBR) jesteśmy największym ośrodkiem finansującym rozwój prac badawczo-rozwojowych w Europie Centralnej. Pracujemy na rzecz wzrostu konkurencyjności polskiej gospodarki. Wspieramy tworzenie i wprowadzanie na rynek nowych produktów i usług, które mogą zrewolucjonizować rzeczywistość każdego z nas. Opracowujemy oraz realizujemy programy, w ramach których naukowcy i przedsiębiorstwa mogą uzyskać finansowanie różnorodnych innowacji. Od początku swojej działalności przeznaczyliśmy na ten cel przeszło 50 miliardów złotych, finansując tysiące projektów badawczych, które codziennie przyczyniają się do poprawy jakości życia milionów Polaków.Przewiń do profilu firmy

Front End Developer.about-us-1: O nasFirma Athenasoft jest wiodącym na rynku polskim producentem oprogramowania dla budownictwa. Najbardziej rozpoznawalnymi produktami naszej firmy są programy do kosztorysowania NORMA (Norma EXPERT, Norma STANDARD 2, Norma PRO).Jesteśmy zgranym zespołem doświadczonych i bardzo doświadczonych programistów w wieku 30-50 lat. W obecnym składzie pracujemy ze sobą co najmniej 10 lat. Nie jesteśmy korporacją tylko firmą inżynierów pragnących stworzyć coś konkretnego i użytecznego. Nie mamy rozbudowanej hierarchii w zespole - preferujemy płaskie struktury i swobodną wymianę myśli z konstruktywną krytyką włącznie.Poszukujemy osoby na stanowisko Front End Developer do długofalowej współpracy przy tworzeniu projektów w postaci serwisów internetowych oraz rozwoju bieżących aplikacji.
